title: The African Queen
description: THE MAN, THE WOMAN AND THE JUNGLEEverything he knew about women, Charlie had learned in ports of call from Marseilles to the Indian Ocean. In his wildest dreams he never expected to meet a girl like Rose Sayer on a tropical river in savage Africa. She was completely dependent on him, utterly in his power.THE AFRICAN QUEENis C.S. FORRESTER'S celebrated novel of a man and a woman thousands of miles from civilization, faced by jungle dangers, the elements, wild savages, and their own fierce passions.[From the back cover.]
author: C.S. Forester
